title: New Sony patent hints at PS6 feature that changes the way you play games
description: PlayStation fans discover a new feature that uses artificial intelligence in a controversial way.
content:
Sony has filed an interesting new patent for technology that uses artificial intelligence to play your games for you.
The patent is for something Sony describes as 'Ghost Player', which is essentially an AI-generated version of the player character t... [1409 chars]

title: MTA probing AI to identify weapons, monitor safety threats in real-time
description: Transit officials are probing proposals from tech companies on how best to use artificial intelligence to patrol subway cars and buses in real-time through thousands of video feeds, documents reveal.
content:

title: Alphabet hits US$4 trillion valuation on AI
description: Alphabet briefly hit $4 trillion in market valuation on Monday, as the Google parent’s sharpened artificial intelligence focus allayed doubts about its strategy and thrust it back to the forefront of the high-stakes race.
content:
